amendatorysection.catchline: Legal expense insurance; policy; certificate of coverage; issuance.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Legal expense insurance may be written as individual, group, blanket, or franchise insurance. Each contractual obligation for legal expense insurance shall be evidenced by a policy. Each person insured under a group policy shall be issued a certificate of coverage.
(2) No policy or certificate of legal expense insurance may be issued in this state unless a copy of the form has been filed with and approved by the director.
